price: (Zakariyyaan) ni jedhe: “(Yaa) Rabbii kiyya! akkamitti ilmi naaf ta’a? Odoo jaartiin too maseena taatee jirtuu, anis dulluma irraa hoonga ga’ee jiruu ?”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا وَقَدۡ بَلَغۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡكِبَرِ عِتِيّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran waqad balaghtu mina al-kibari ʿitiyyan
